{{also|zéit}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|zīt}}, from {{inh|de|goh|zīt}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*tīdiz}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*dīti-||time, period}}, from {{m|ine-pro|*dī-||time}}. Cognate with {{cog|nds|Tiet}}, {{m|nds|Tied}}, {{cog|nl|tijd}}, {{cog|en|tide}}, {{cog|da|tid}}. Also cognate, more distantly, with {{cog|en|time}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[tsaɪ̯t]}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Zeit.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Zeit.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|Zeit}}
